tasks.title: Initialize development environment
tasks.description: Set up project infrastructure including GitHub organization, CI/CD pipeline, development environments, and team onboarding materials
tasks.details:
1. Create GitHub organization and repositories
2. Set up CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
3. Configure development environments
4. Establish coding standards and ESLint/Prettier configs
5. Create project documentation structure
6. Set up monitoring and logging infrastructure
7. Configure security protocols
8. Create team onboarding materials
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all infrastructure components are accessible and functional. Test CI/CD pipeline with sample commits.

tasks.title: Create Obsidian plugin foundation
tasks.description: Develop the base Obsidian plugin architecture with TypeScript setup, plugin manifest, and core plugin structure
tasks.details:
1. Set up TypeScript configuration for Obsidian development
2. Create plugin manifest.json with proper metadata
3. Implement base plugin class extending Obsidian Plugin
4. Set up build system with Vite/ESBuild
5. Configure hot-reload development workflow
6. Create plugin settings infrastructure
7. Set up plugin lifecycle management
8. Implement error handling and logging
tasks.testStrategy: Test plugin loading in Obsidian developer vault. Verify hot-reload works. Test settings persistence.

tasks.title: Implement Life-OS vault structure
tasks.description: Create the foundational directory structure for the ADHD Operating System based on Life-OS template with all required folders and configurations
tasks.details:
1. Design comprehensive folder hierarchy
2. Create directory structure:
   - ðŸ“¥ Inbox (quick capture)
   - ðŸ“… Daily (daily notes)
   - âœ… Tasks (task management)
   - ðŸ“Š Dashboard (analytics)
   - ðŸŽ¯ Habits (tracking)
   - ðŸ’° Finance (ADHD-friendly)
   - âš™ï¸ Config (settings)
   - ðŸ¤– Claude (AI integration)
3. Implement vault initialization wizard
4. Create folder templates and metadata
5. Set up automatic folder creation on plugin install
6. Configure folder icons and visual hierarchy
tasks.testStrategy: Verify complete folder structure creation. Test vault initialization on fresh Obsidian instance. Validate folder permissions.

tasks.title: Build ADHD-optimized daily note system
tasks.description: Create daily note templates with ADHD-specific features including brain dump, time blocking, energy tracking, and overwhelm prevention
tasks.details:
1. Design daily note template structure:
   - Morning brain dump section (unlimited capture)
   - Visual time blocks with drag-and-drop
   - Energy level indicator (1-5 scale)
   - Quick task capture area
   - "3 Must Do" focus section
   - Celebration/wins tracker
   - Evening reflection prompts
2. Implement auto-population from previous day
3. Create crisis mode toggle
4. Add visual progress indicators
5. Implement mobile-responsive design
6. Build template customization options
tasks.testStrategy: Test daily note creation for 7 consecutive days. Verify task migration. Test crisis mode activation. Validate mobile layout.

tasks.title: Develop intelligent task management system
tasks.description: Build ADHD-specific task system with automatic breakdown, visual prioritization, dependency tracking, and shame-free deferral
tasks.details:
1. Create ADHD task data model:
   - Estimated time with ADHD buffer (+40%)
   - Energy level required (low/medium/high)
   - Interest score (1-5)
   - Complexity score
   - Procrastination tracking
2. Implement auto-breakdown for tasks >2 hours
3. Build visual priority matrix (Urgency vs Interest)
4. Create dependency visualization graph
5. Implement "Quick Wins" dopamine section
6. Add task aging indicators
7. Build one-click shame-free deferral
8. Create smart task suggestions based on energy
tasks.testStrategy: Test task creation and auto-breakdown. Verify priority calculations. Test deferral without data loss. Validate dependency chains.

tasks.title: Create frictionless inbox capture system
tasks.description: Implement zero-friction capture system for thoughts, tasks, and ideas with intelligent categorization and processing workflows
tasks.details:
1. Build quick capture interface:
   - Global hotkey activation
   - Minimal required fields
   - Auto-timestamp and context
   - Voice-to-text support
   - Image/screenshot capture
2. Implement intelligent categorization
3. Create daily inbox processing workflow
4. Add batch operations for sorting
5. Build mobile-optimized capture
6. Implement Obsidian URI scheme support
7. Create inbox zero celebration
8. Add capture analytics
tasks.testStrategy: Test capture speed (<2 seconds). Verify categorization accuracy. Test voice input. Validate mobile capture.

tasks.title: Implement working memory augmentation
tasks.description: Create external memory system with context preservation, smart search, and visual breadcrumbs to combat ADHD working memory challenges
tasks.details:
1. Build context preservation system:
   - Task switching context cards
   - "Where was I?" recovery feature
   - Automatic session documentation
   - Visual breadcrumb navigation
2. Implement smart search:
   - Fuzzy matching
   - Natural language queries
   - Search result previews
   - Recent searches history
3. Create related items suggestions
4. Add voice note attachments
5. Build quick reference panels
6. Implement context-aware reminders
tasks.testStrategy: Test context switching scenarios. Verify search accuracy <500ms. Test voice note transcription. Validate breadcrumb navigation.

tasks.title: Build time awareness visualization tools
tasks.description: Create visual time management tools to combat ADHD time blindness with analog representations and gentle notifications
tasks.details:
1. Implement visual time representations:
   - Analog clock visualizations for tasks
   - Time block visual indicators
   - Progress bars with time remaining
   - Calendar heat maps
2. Build time tracking features:
   - Automatic time tracking
   - Time estimation learning
   - Actual vs estimated comparisons
   - Buffer time auto-calculation
3. Create notification system:
   - Gentle "time's up" alerts
   - Meeting approach warnings
   - Customizable notification styles
4. Add historical time analytics
5. Implement time zone support
tasks.testStrategy: Test time visualization accuracy. Verify notification timing. Test estimation learning algorithm. Validate timezone handling.

tasks.title: Develop ADHD-adapted focus enhancement tools
tasks.description: Build Pomodoro timer system with ADHD adaptations, hyperfocus detection, and distraction blocking features
tasks.details:
1. Create adaptive Pomodoro system:
   - Customizable work/break intervals
   - Energy-based duration suggestions
   - Visual and audio cues
   - Progress celebration
2. Implement hyperfocus detection:
   - Activity monitoring
   - Gentle interruption system
   - Automatic break reminders
   - Hydration/movement prompts
3. Build distraction blocking:
   - Website/app blockers
   - Focus mode UI simplification
   - Emergency override option
4. Add body doubling features
5. Create focus session analytics
tasks.testStrategy: Test timer accuracy. Verify hyperfocus detection. Test distraction blocking. Validate break reminders.

tasks.title: Implement crisis management mode
tasks.description: Create overwhelm intervention system with panic button activation, task simplification, and supportive features
tasks.details:
1. Build crisis mode activation:
   - Single-tap panic button
   - Keyboard shortcut (Cmd+Shift+H)
   - Voice activation option
2. Implement crisis features:
   - Simplify to 3 essential tasks only
   - Hide all non-critical information
   - Soothing color scheme
   - Breathing exercise integration
   - Supportive messaging
3. Create automated responses:
   - Calendar clearing options
   - Auto-email templates
   - Task rescheduling
4. Add recovery tracking
5. Build crisis prevention alerts
tasks.testStrategy: Test panic button activation. Verify task simplification. Test breathing exercises. Validate recovery tracking.

tasks.title: Create habit tracking system
tasks.description: Develop visual habit tracking with ADHD-friendly features including flexible streaks, visual rewards, and forgiving mechanics
tasks.details:
1. Build habit tracking core:
   - Visual habit chains
   - Flexible scheduling (not just daily)
   - Multiple completion states
   - Partial credit system
2. Implement ADHD-friendly features:
   - Streak forgiveness (1-2 missed days)
   - Visual progress indicators
   - Celebration animations
   - Habit stacking suggestions
3. Create habit templates:
   - Morning routines
   - Medication reminders
   - Self-care habits
   - Focus rituals
4. Add habit analytics
5. Build habit sharing (optional)
tasks.testStrategy: Test habit creation and tracking. Verify streak calculations. Test forgiveness mechanics. Validate visual feedback.

tasks.title: Build gamification and reward system
tasks.description: Create dopamine-driven engagement system with XP, achievements, levels, and meaningful rewards tailored for ADHD motivation
tasks.details:
1. Implement XP and leveling:
   - Task completion XP
   - Bonus XP for streaks
   - Level progression system
   - Visual level-up celebrations
2. Create achievement system:
   - 100+ achievement types
   - Hidden achievements for discovery
   - Achievement categories
   - Custom achievement creation
3. Build reward mechanics:
   - Immediate feedback
   - Random bonus rewards
   - Daily quests
   - Weekly challenges
4. Add social features (optional):
   - Share achievements
   - Leaderboards
   - Team challenges
5. Implement anti-gaming measures
tasks.testStrategy: Test XP calculations. Verify achievement triggers. Test reward distribution. Validate anti-cheating measures.

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive analytics dashboard
tasks.description: Create visual analytics dashboards for daily, weekly, and monthly progress tracking with ADHD-specific insights
tasks.details:
1. Build daily dashboard:
   - Task completion rate
   - Time awareness accuracy
   - Energy patterns
   - Focus session summary
   - Quick wins achieved
2. Create weekly analytics:
   - Productivity trends
   - Habit consistency
   - Time estimation improvement
   - Overwhelm frequency
3. Implement monthly insights:
   - Pattern identification
   - Goal achievement
   - Growth metrics
   - Recommendations
4. Add visual representations:
   - Charts and graphs
   - Heat maps
   - Progress rings
5. Export capabilities
tasks.testStrategy: Test data aggregation accuracy. Verify visualization rendering. Test export formats. Validate insight generation.

tasks.title: Integrate Claude AI for intelligent assistance
tasks.description: Implement AI layer using Claude API for task breakdown, prioritization, time estimation, and personalized ADHD support
tasks.details:
1. Set up Claude API integration:
   - API key management
   - Request/response handling
   - Error handling and fallbacks
   - Rate limiting
2. Implement AI features:
   - Intelligent task breakdown
   - Natural language task input
   - Priority suggestions
   - Time estimation learning
   - Pattern recognition
3. Build ADHD-specific AI:
   - Personalized recommendations
   - Overwhelm prediction
   - Energy-based scheduling
   - Procrastination intervention
4. Create AI settings panel
5. Implement privacy controls
tasks.testStrategy: Test API integration. Verify AI suggestions quality. Test fallback behavior. Validate privacy controls.

tasks.title: Implement calendar synchronization
tasks.description: Create bi-directional calendar sync with Google Calendar and Outlook, including buffer time injection and conflict resolution
tasks.details:
1. Build calendar integrations:
   - Google Calendar OAuth setup
   - Outlook/Exchange connection
   - iCal subscription support
   - API authentication handling
2. Implement sync features:
   - Bi-directional sync
   - Real-time updates via webhooks
   - Conflict resolution UI
   - Selective sync options
3. Add ADHD features:
   - Automatic buffer time (15-30min)
   - Travel time calculation
   - Prep time reminders
   - Energy-based scheduling
4. Create sync settings
5. Build offline queue
tasks.testStrategy: Test OAuth flows. Verify sync accuracy. Test conflict resolution. Validate buffer time injection.

tasks.title: Create progressive web app for mobile
tasks.description: Build PWA companion app for mobile quick capture, task management, and on-the-go ADHD support
tasks.details:
1. Set up PWA infrastructure:
   - Service worker implementation
   - Offline capability
   - App manifest
   - Install prompts
2. Build mobile features:
   - Quick capture interface
   - Voice input support
   - Photo capture for tasks
   - Location-based reminders
   - Push notifications
3. Optimize for mobile:
   - Touch-friendly UI
   - Reduced data usage
   - Battery optimization
   - Fast loading
4. Implement sync:
   - Real-time sync with desktop
   - Conflict resolution
   - Offline queue
5. Add mobile-specific features
tasks.testStrategy: Test offline functionality. Verify sync reliability. Test on various devices. Validate battery usage.

tasks.title: Build secure sync and backup system
tasks.description: Create robust synchronization and backup infrastructure with encryption, versioning, and multi-device support
tasks.details:
1. Implement sync engine:
   - Real-time sync protocol
   - Conflict resolution algorithms
   - Delta sync for efficiency
   - Multi-device support
   - Offline queue management
2. Build backup system:
   - Automated daily backups
   - Version history (30 days)
   - Point-in-time recovery
   - Export to standard formats
3. Add security features:
   - End-to-end encryption option
   - Zero-knowledge architecture
   - Secure key management
   - Privacy controls
4. Create sync UI:
   - Sync status indicators
   - Conflict resolution interface
   - Backup management
5. Performance optimization
tasks.testStrategy: Test sync reliability across devices. Verify encryption. Test backup/restore. Validate conflict resolution.

tasks.title: Create onboarding experience
tasks.description: Build progressive onboarding system that introduces ADHD-OS features gradually without overwhelming new users
tasks.details:
1. Design onboarding flow:
   - ADHD type assessment
   - Personal preference quiz
   - Initial setup wizard
   - Feature introduction
   - Success celebration
2. Implement progressive disclosure:
   - Start with 3 core features
   - Unlock features gradually
   - Achievement-based progression
   - Skip options for experienced users
3. Create onboarding content:
   - Interactive tutorials
   - Video walkthroughs
   - Sample data generation
   - Quick win tasks
4. Build help system:
   - Contextual help tooltips
   - Searchable documentation
   - Community forum links
5. First-week engagement plan
tasks.testStrategy: Test with new users. Measure completion rates. Test skip functionality. Validate help system.

tasks.title: Develop comprehensive template system
tasks.description: Create template management system for all Life-OS components with customization and sharing capabilities
tasks.details:
1. Build template infrastructure:
   - Template storage system
   - Template versioning
   - Custom template creation
   - Template variables
   - Conditional logic
2. Create default templates:
   - Daily note variations
   - Project templates
   - Meeting notes
   - Review templates
   - Crisis response templates
3. Implement template features:
   - Template marketplace
   - Community sharing
   - Import/export
   - Template customization UI
4. Add smart features:
   - Context-aware suggestions
   - Auto-template selection
   - Template analytics
5. Build template editor
tasks.testStrategy: Test template creation and application. Verify variable substitution. Test sharing features. Validate customization.

tasks.title: Implement import/export system
tasks.description: Create data portability features for importing from other tools and exporting in standard formats
tasks.details:
1. Build import functionality:
   - Todoist importer
   - Notion importer
   - Trello importer
   - CSV bulk import
   - Migration wizard UI
2. Create export features:
   - JSON export (full data)
   - CSV export (simplified)
   - Markdown export
   - PDF reports
   - Selective export options
3. Implement ETL pipeline:
   - Data validation
   - Format conversion
   - Error handling
   - Progress tracking
   - Rollback capability
4. Add migration tools:
   - Data mapping UI
   - Preview before import
   - Incremental import
5. Build backup integration
tasks.testStrategy: Test import from each source. Verify data integrity. Test large imports. Validate export formats.

tasks.title: Create comprehensive testing framework
tasks.description: Build testing infrastructure including unit tests, integration tests, E2E tests, and ADHD user testing protocols
tasks.details:
1. Set up testing infrastructure:
   - Vitest for unit testing
   - Integration test suite
   - E2E with Playwright
   - Performance testing
   - Accessibility testing
2. Create test coverage:
   - Core functionality (80% min)
   - API endpoints
   - UI components
   - Data integrity
   - Sync reliability
3. Build ADHD-specific tests:
   - Cognitive load testing
   - Overwhelm scenarios
   - Time awareness accuracy
   - Focus feature validation
4. Implement CI/CD testing:
   - Automated test runs
   - Coverage reports
   - Performance benchmarks
5. User testing protocols
tasks.testStrategy: Meta - test the testing framework itself. Verify coverage accuracy. Test CI/CD integration.

tasks.title: Create documentation and knowledge base
tasks.description: Build comprehensive documentation including user guides, developer docs, API reference, and video tutorials
tasks.details:
1. Create user documentation:
   - Getting started guide
   - Feature documentation
   - Video tutorials
   - FAQ section
   - Troubleshooting guide
2. Build developer docs:
   - API reference
   - Plugin development guide
   - Architecture overview
   - Contributing guidelines
   - Code examples
3. Implement docs infrastructure:
   - Searchable docs site
   - Version control
   - Auto-generation from code
   - Interactive examples
4. Create ADHD resources:
   - ADHD tips and strategies
   - Success stories
   - Community resources
   - Clinical information
5. Localization preparation
tasks.testStrategy: Test documentation accuracy. Verify search functionality. Test interactive examples. Validate video playback.

tasks.title: Launch preparation and beta testing
tasks.description: Prepare for public launch including beta testing program, performance optimization, marketing materials, and community building
tasks.details:
1. Beta testing program:
   - Recruit 100-200 ADHD testers
   - Create feedback systems
   - Weekly iteration cycles
   - Bug tracking and triage
   - Success metrics tracking
2. Performance optimization:
   - Load time optimization
   - Memory usage reduction
   - Database query optimization
   - CDN configuration
   - Mobile performance
3. Marketing preparation:
   - Landing page creation
   - Demo video production
   - Press kit preparation
   - Social media strategy
   - Influencer outreach
4. Community building:
   - Discord server setup
   - Forum creation
   - Moderator recruitment
   - Community guidelines
5. Launch checklist completion
tasks.testStrategy: Run beta testing protocols. Measure performance metrics. Test community features. Validate launch readiness.
